scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder consists of multiple letters, checks written to various individuals and companies, account statements, receipts for various goods, and bills from different companies. Several letters are addressed to Calvin Cogswell Morgan and Co. of Lexington, Kentucky, to discuss the wool business and money matters. There are also five letters written to Henrietta Morgan from her son, Thomas Morgan, discussing his life in school and lamenting about his homesickness.
